pages.text: Laminacaris, a species formerly assigned to Anomalocaris, was a large radiodont which lived and ate in a similar fashion to other anomalocarids, using their appendages to catch and eat smaller prey.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Fish$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
